Class Layer

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.buildpack.platform.docker.type.Layer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Content
public class Layer extends Object implements Content
A layer that can be written to an ImageArchive.
Since:
2.3.0
Author:
Phillip Webb
